Country Coordinates

Source: R/data.R
country_coords.Rd

A saved shapefile of the world for use in onetable, and for mapping.

Usage

country_coords

Format

A simple feature collection with 172 features and 4 variables:

TYPE

character Entity type

ADMIN

character English country name

id

character ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code

geometry

list List of simple features for mapping

Details

Projected using CRS: "+proj=robin +lon_0=0 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs"

Northern Cyprus, Antarctica, and Fiji are removed

See also

get_country_coords() for generation

On this page
